title: FS: Extremely Rare Piedmont 42 High End
author: Bigb13

posts.post_title: FS: Extremely Rare Piedmont 42 High End
posts.post_content: For sale is an extremely Rare Piedmont factory 42 card of Ed Konetchy glove near ground. Believe only one graded higher. SGC 70 excellent plus 5.5 Looking for best offer.  One of the highest graded cards. [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=267467&d=1490635710[/IMG]
Price lowered 4500 or best offer also put on eBay. This is simply a gorgeous card.
